nodes.text: During the Second Galactic Civil War, Dark Lady of the Sith Lumiya maintained a third set of quarters on neg three four-thirteen of the bedrock levels in the Zorp House complex of Coruscant's Galactic City. On a floor reserved predominately for building workers, Lumiya's bedrock-level quarters were the most spartan of her three abodes, and served as a secret passage to and from Zorp House.
